title: Fresh tomato salsa (with bruschetta variations)
description: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall counts the ways to enjoy this classic Italian treat. Use tomatoes at the peak of ripeness.
ingredients: 500g/1lb2oz ripe, full-flavoured tomatoes (such as Sungold or Gardener's Delight)
1 medium shallot or small red onion, finely chopped
a squeeze of lemon or 1 tbsp white wine vinegar
salt and fresh ground black pepper
